first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay {00003} bail as soon as possible

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, {00002} Police here. Your son-in-law was arrested for prostitution. Pay {00003} bail quickly to avoid trouble.
Oh no! I had no idea. How do I pay the {00003} bail? Please tell me quickly.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I wonder if you need the exam questions. Can you fill in the link you sent you for a while and finish the reservation?

dialogue.text: Hello, this is manual customer service of {00004}. The exam is near, do you need the questions? Please fill the link to reserve.
Oh, I didn't know about this service. Can you send me the link so I can check it out?
Sure, I just sent it. Please complete the form quickly to secure your spot for {00004} exam questions.
